Project Description
WCF RIA Services sample LoB application (case study) built on PRISM with Entity Framework Model. It's a simple application for a fictive company Teleco Systems. Sample shows how to create Modular Silverlight applications with PRISM (Composite App Library) and WCF RIA Services.

You can read more about this project on my blog http://bachelorthesis.zdechovan.com/wcf-ria-services-mvvm-prism-lob-application-introduction/.

Part of my bachelor thesis is implementation of modular business silverlight application build upon MVVM (Separated presentation) pattern and WCF RIA Services (simplifies the development of n-tier RIA solutions).
